validations.message:
Recommended property `description` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",

    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

Recommended property `offers` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

```

  "priceCurrency": "GBP",
```

validations.message:
Recommended property `description` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

Recommended property `offers` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"offers": {
  "@type": "Offer",
  "identifier": "OX-AD",
  "name": "Adult",
  "price": 7.5,
  "priceCurrency": "GBP",
  "url": "https://profile.everyoneactive.com/booking?Site=0140&Activities=1402CBP20150217&Culture=en-GB"
}
```
Recommended property `@id` is missing from `Place`.

Recommended property `url` is missing from `Place`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"url": "http://www.rphs.org.uk/"
```

Recommended property `description` is missing from `Place`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "Raynes Park High School in London"
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `Place`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```

Recommended property `telephone` is missing from `Place`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"telephone": "01253 473934"
```
Recommended property `openingHoursSpecification` is missing from `Place`.

Recommended property `url` is missing from `Organization`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"url": "http://www.speedball-world.com"
```

Recommended property `telephone` is missing from `Organization`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"telephone": "01234 567890"
```

Recommended property `sameAs` is missing from `Organization`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"sameAs": [
  "https://www.facebook.com/everyoneactive/",
  "https://twitter.com/everyoneactive"
]
```

Recommended property `name` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"name": "Speedball winger position"
```

Recommended property `ageRestriction` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"ageRestriction": {
  "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
  "minValue": 15,
  "maxValue": 60
}
```
The value of this property should have at least 3 decimal places. Note that this notice will also appear when trailing zeros have been truncated.

config.testName: Single anonymous leased spaces are unavailable for purchase by other users
config.testDescription: For an opportunity with 1 spaces: Check the opportunity has 1 spaces in the feed. Run C1 to book one item (creating an anonymous lease). Check the opportunity has 0 space in the feed. Run C1 again for a new Order UUID for the same opportunity attempting to book 1 space, expecting OrderItems to be returned having an OpportunityCapacityIsReservedByLeaseError.
